## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AbstractInstanceType](./core-types.abstractinstancetype.md) | Abstract classes don't support the builtin <code>InstanceType</code> helper. This is an alternative which allows us to pull out the type of the prototype. |
|  [ActionGetter](./core-types.actiongetter.md) | Pull an action method out of the extension manager. |
|  [AnyConstructor](./core-types.anyconstructor.md) | Matches any constructor type (but not of abstract classes). |
|  [AnyFunction](./core-types.anyfunction.md) | Concisely and cleanly define an arbitrary function. |
|  [Attrs](./core-types.attrs.md) | Used for attributes which can be added to prosemirror nodes and marks. |
|  [AttrsWithClass](./core-types.attrswithclass.md) |  |
|  [Brand](./core-types.brand.md) | Create a "branded" version of a type. TypeScript won't allow implicit conversion to this type |
|  [CommandFunction](./core-types.commandfunction.md) | This is the type signature for actions within the prosemirror editor. |
|  [CommandMarkTypeParams](./core-types.commandmarktypeparams.md) |  |
|  [CommandNodeTypeParams](./core-types.commandnodetypeparams.md) |  |
|  [CommandStatusCheck](./core-types.commandstatuscheck.md) | The return signature for an extension's <code>isActive</code> and <code>isEnabled</code> method |
|  [CommandStatusFunction](./core-types.commandstatusfunction.md) |  |
|  [CommandTypeParams](./core-types.commandtypeparams.md) |  |
|  [Decoration](./core-types.decoration.md) |  |
|  [DecorationSet](./core-types.decorationset.md) |  |
|  [DeepPartial](./core-types.deeppartial.md) | A recursive partial type. Useful for object that will be merged with defaults. |
|  [DispatchFunction](./core-types.dispatchfunction.md) | Used to apply the Prosemirror transaction to the current EditorState. |
|  [DOMOutputSpec](./core-types.domoutputspec.md) | Defines the return type of the toDom methods for both Nodes and marks |
|  [EditorSchema](./core-types.editorschema.md) |  |
|  [EditorState](./core-types.editorstate.md) |  |
|  [EditorView](./core-types.editorview.md) |  |
|  [ElementUnion](./core-types.elementunion.md) |  |
|  [ExtensionCommandFunction](./core-types.extensioncommandfunction.md) |  |
|  [ExtensionManagerMarkTypeParams](./core-types.extensionmanagermarktypeparams.md) | The extension manager type params for a prosemirror <code>NodeType</code> extension |
|  [ExtensionManagerNodeTypeParams](./core-types.extensionmanagernodetypeparams.md) | The extension manager type params for a prosemirror <code>NodeType</code> extension |
|  [ExtensionManagerTypeParams](./core-types.extensionmanagertypeparams.md) | Generic extension manager type params for methods which require a prosemirror NodeType.<!-- -->This is used to generate the specific types for Marks and Nodes. |
|  [ExtraAttrs](./core-types.extraattrs.md) | Data representation tuple used for injecting extra attributes into an extension. |
|  [ExtraAttrsTuple](./core-types.extraattrstuple.md) | The first value is the name of the attribute the second value is the default and the third is the optional parse name from the dom via <code>node.getAttribute()</code>. |
|  [Flavor](./core-types.flavor.md) | Create a "flavored" version of a type. TypeScript will disallow mixing flavors, but will allow unflavored values of that type to be passed in where a flavored version is expected. This is a less restrictive form of branding. |
|  [Fragment](./core-types.fragment.md) |  |
|  [GeneralExtensionTags](./core-types.generalextensiontags.md) | The tag names that apply to any extension whether plain, node or mark. These are mostly used for nodes and marks the main difference is they are added to the <code>tags</code> parameter of the extension rather than within the schema. |
|  [GetAttrs](./core-types.getattrs.md) | A function which takes a regex match array (strings) or a single string match and transforms it into an <code>Attrs</code> object. |
|  [HelperGetter](./core-types.helpergetter.md) | Pull a helper method out of the extension manager. |
|  [InputRule](./core-types.inputrule.md) |  |
|  [Key](./core-types.key.md) | Alternative to builtin <code>keyof</code> operator. |
|  [KeyboardBindings](./core-types.keyboardbindings.md) | A map of keyboard bindings and their corresponding command functions (a.k.a editing actions). |
|  [KeyOfThemeVariant](./core-types.keyofthemevariant.md) |  |
|  [Literal](./core-types.literal.md) | All the literal types |
|  [MakeNullable](./core-types.makenullable.md) | Makes specified keys of an interface nullable while the rest stay the same. |
|  [MakeOptional](./core-types.makeoptional.md) | Makes specified keys of an interface optional while the rest stay the same. |
|  [MakeReadonly](./core-types.makereadonly.md) | Makes specified keys of an interface readonly. |
|  [MakeRequired](./core-types.makerequired.md) | Makes specified keys of an interface Required while the rest remain unchanged. |
|  [Mapping](./core-types.mapping.md) |  |
|  [Mark](./core-types.mark.md) |  |
|  [MarkExtensionTags](./core-types.markextensiontags.md) | Provides the different mark groups which are defined in the mark extension specification. |
|  [MarkType](./core-types.marktype.md) |  |
|  [NodeExtensionTags](./core-types.nodeextensiontags.md) | Provides an object of the different node groups <code>block</code> and <code>inline</code> which are defined in the node extension specification. |
|  [NodeMatch](./core-types.nodematch.md) | Utility type for matching the name of a node to via a string or function. |

|  [Nullable](./core-types.nullable.md) | Makes a type nullable or undefined. |
|  [OptionalFromToParams](./core-types.optionalfromtoparams.md) | A paramter builder type which uses [FromToParams](./core-types.fromtoparams.md) where <code>from</code> or <code>to</code>, or both can be set as optional. |
|  [PartialWithRequiredKeys](./core-types.partialwithrequiredkeys.md) | Make the whole interface partial except for some specified keys which will be made required. |

|  [RemirrorInterpolation](./core-types.remirrorinterpolation.md) | A union of types which are acceptable inputs for styling within remirror. |

|  [Slice](./core-types.slice.md) |  |
|  [StringKey](./core-types.stringkey.md) | An alternative to keyof that only extracts the string keys. |
|  [SxThemeProp](./core-types.sxthemeprop.md) | This prop allows for deeper nesting of styles within media queries and tags. |
|  [Transaction](./core-types.transaction.md) |  |
|  [TransactionTransformer](./core-types.transactiontransformer.md) | Receives a transaction and returns an new transaction.<!-- -->Can be used to update the transaction and customise commands. |
|  [TupleValue](./core-types.tuplevalue.md) | Extract the values of a tuple as a union type. |
|  [UnionToIntersection](./core-types.uniontointersection.md) | A magical utility which maps a union type to an intersection type using TypeScript KungFu Taken from https://stackoverflow.com/a/50375286/2172153 |
|  [Value](./core-types.value.md) | Extract the values of an object as a union type. |
|  [WithVariants](./core-types.withvariants.md) | Adds a variant property to the object.<!-- -->This is used with the <code>SxThemeProp</code> and allow a user to configure the variant to use for the active style. |
